Summary: Horseshoe Shaped UFO Seen In Ann Arbor, Michigan
divs: sighting detailsfor a detailed online report please seehttp:\\members.home.net\tlemire\annarbor.htmlthe 3 witnesses were in the downtown ann arbor area, going to a local coffeeshop, when their attention was drawn by two other unknown witnesses to a"horseshoe or c-shaped" object flying in the sky. the witnesses did notimmediately recognize this object as anything familiar, but at first thought itwas a promotional balloon. the object was not lit and appeared to bereflecting the downtown lights. they watched the object slowly movenorth-northwest and fade away into the haze. the witnesses heard no noiseassociated with the object.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Ann Arbor
There were no other sightings in Ann Arbor on or around September 9th 2000
